ygData.subject: Re: Rondo?
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, I have got about 10 tongues, a paw and a peg leg, but I can t get the devil to speak. ... -- Sean O Brien sobrien@nc.stj.qld.edu.au
ygData.messageBody:
heh, I have got about 10 tongues, a paw and a peg leg, but I can't get
the devil to speak.

> "Whitmore, Lance" wrote:
>
> He's part of the Parrying Pick Quest ( a dwarf Rogue only weapon ).
> Talk to a NPC named Diggins in Kaladim and he will tell you what to
> do.
>
> Lance
>
